H0.text: Complete the title of this 1970's group 'Sutherland Brothers and .'. Brothers

H3.text: Complete the title of this 1970's group 'Sutherland Brothers and .'. QUIVER

A4.text: The Sutherland Brothers and Quiver recorded several albums and had a significant international hit single with the song 'Arms of Mary' in 1976.
